sections.title: Introduction
sections.description: This page can help you learn how to use the IoT Platform to manage your devices.

sections.title: Basic Usage
sections.description: This section explains the basic usage of the IoT Platform, including setting up and controlling devices.
steps: Step 1: Log in to your account.
Step 2: Add your device to the platform.
Step 3: Control the device through the dashboard.

sections.title: Setting Up the Device
sections.description: Follow these steps to set up your IoT device for the first time.
steps: Unbox your device and connect it to a power source.
Follow the instructions to connect it to your Wi-Fi network.
Use the platform's app or web dashboard to register the device.

sections.title: Controlling the Device
sections.description: Once your device is set up, you can control it through the platformâ€™s interface.
steps: Turn the device ON/OFF using the main control button.
Adjust settings such as brightness or temperature from the device control panel.
Schedule tasks for automation (e.g., turn on/off at specific times).

sections.title: Monitoring Device Status
sections.description: You can monitor the status of your devices in real-time through the platform's dashboard.
steps: Check device health and performance metrics (battery level, connectivity status).

sections.title: Error Troubleshooting
sections.description: If you encounter issues, here are some common solutions:
steps: Device not connecting: Ensure your Wi-Fi network is stable and try resetting the device.
Device not responding: Check if the device is powered on and try rebooting it.
Platform not syncing: Ensure the platform has internet access and refresh the dashboard.
